original_text: When you depart from me today, you will meet two men by Rachel's tomb in the territory of Benjamin at Zelzah, and they will say to you, ‘The donkeys that you went to seek are found, and now your father has ceased to care about the donkeys and is anxious about you, saying, “What shall I do about my son?”’
korean_text: 네가 오늘 나를 떠나가다가 베냐민 경계 셀사에 있는 라헬의 묘실 곁에서 두 사람을 만나리니 그들이 네게 이르기를 네가 찾으러 갔던 암나귀들을 찾은지라 네 아버지가 암나귀들의 염려는 놓았으나 너희로 말미암아 걱정하여 이르되 내 아들을 위하여 어찌하리요 하더라 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: When you depart from me today
and they will say to you
'The donkeys that you went to seek are found
and now your father has ceased to care about the donkeys
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 당신 아버지는 나귀들에 대한 걱정을 그치고

sentences.original_text: 'What shall I do about my son?'
